backend

Class Return

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.transactions.Record
      • backend.transactions.Return

  • public class Return
extends Record
    This class represents a return transaction record. It is responsible for providing access to the return transaction information. It inherits xstreambackend.Record attributes and methods.
